name: Fixer Upper

ingredients.name: Mozart White Chocolate Vanilla Cream Liqueur

preparation:
Don’t let name fool you. It won’t take too much work to assemble this mouthwatering choc-tail. All you need is vodka, Mozart White Chocolate Vanilla Cream Liqueur, espresso, Cynar and a few dashes of mole bitters to make this subtle and rich masterpiece.

This recipe originally appeared as part of “Win Valentine’s Days with Any of These Irresistible Choc-tails.”

Place all the ingredients except the espresso into a cocktail shaker filled with ice.

Shake vigorously and strain into a rocks glass filled with ice.

Float the espresso on top of the cocktail.

Serve with a vanilla wafer.
